author: Kate Ng, Kate Ng
title: Coronavirus: Vietnam starts to lift lockdown measures after no deaths reported
description: Some parts of Hanoi remain under strict lockdown
content:
Vietnam has started lifting the movement restrictions imposed on citizens to contain the coronavirus lockdown, way ahead of most of southeast Asia.
Fewer than 300 coronavirus cases have been reported in Vietnam, with no deaths, since infections were first de… [+2497 chars]
